description.value:
You become trained in Society or Thievery; if you are already trained in both of these skills, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You can use Perception instead of Survival to Track, and you gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Experienced Tracker] skill feat.

Special You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.5RH1CkZQHYpsOium]{Edgewatch Detective} archetype.

source.value: Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace
